xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 14 Parittārammaṇattika » 14.7 Pañhāvāra » 14.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
Parittārammaṇattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nahetuduka
40.
2251Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke tīṇi…pe…  sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2252Paccanīyānulomaṃ.
Pañhāvāro.
2253Parittārammaṇattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 14.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānulomaup15 Hīnattika >>
